About Us

Peptide Valley is a health and wellness technology company incorporated in New Jersey by SinoMed Peptide Valley (SMPV) to
  • explore the US market for SMPV peptide products.
  • collaborate with US companies and research organizations to develop new products
  • export US products to Chinese market utilizing its sophisticated sales networks in China.

SinoMed Peptide Valley (SMPV)

SinoMed Peptide Valley (SMPV) is a Chinese health and wellness technology company specializing in research and development, manufacturing, and sales of dietary supplements, cosmetics, and small molecule peptide raw materials. It developed proprietary production technology to process natural plants such as ginseng into the form of peptides. Its main product Ginseng Peptides is a well-known nutritional dietary supplement brand in China. SMPV has nearly 20 branches in China, with sales exceeding $80 million in 2018.

Previous Next

History of SMPV

2011: Mr. Shuwei Zong and colleagues started ginseng peptide research and development.
2012: Mr. Shuwei Zong co-founded Jilin TaiGu (Peptide Valley) Bioengineering Co. (the predecessor of SMPV).
2014: Jilin TaiGu built 15,000 square meters (3.7 acres) facility with two automatic production lines with proprietary technology to process natural plants such as ginseng into the form of peptides.
2014: Jilin TaiGu started to collaborate with Peking University Health Science Center to conduct 24 ginseng peptide related research projects.
2015: Jilin Peptide Bioengineering Co., Ltd. was grated the Innovative Patent "Extraction Method for Ginseng Peptide" (ZL201510622841.0).
2017: With strategic investment from Sinopharm Group Co., Ltd, Jilin TaiGu Bioengineering Co. became Guoyao TaiGu (SinoMed Peptide Valley).

Research

What are Peptides?

Peptides are short chains of amino acid monomers linked by peptide (amide) bonds. A peptide is also considered to be an incomplete decomposition product of a protein. It is a kind of compound whose molecular structure is between an amino acid and a protein, therefore a structural and functional fragment of the protein.

In consumer market, peptide products are mostly related to proteins and amino acids in dietary supplements and cosmetics.

Our Team

Investors and Founders

Our investors and founders are Hong Luo (Hope), Shuwei Zong (tiger), and Juliet Lo. The initial capital investor is SinoMed Peptide Valley (SMPV).

Founding Partners

Shuwei Zong
Founding Partner
tiger@peptide-valley.com

Mr. Zong started his career in sales in the fields of Communication, Automobile, and Real Estate. He has served as General Manager, Director and Chairman in many Chinese corporations.

A serial entrepreneur, Mr. Zong co-founded Jilin TaiGu (Peptide Valley) Bioengineering Co., Ltd. in 2012. He founded SMPV in 2017 and has been serving as its Chairman and General Manager ever since.

Mr. Zong is the Executive Director of Jilin Charity Federation and the first Director of Jilin Provincial Traditional Chinese Medicine Health Industry Association.

Hong Luo
Founding Partner
hope@peptide-valley.com

Ms. Luo has a broad educational background from undergraduate degree in Aerospace Engineering, master degree in Sociology, Mass Communication and Social Influence, to an MBA from the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.

She has worked as an Aerospace Engineer, senior consultant at Bain & Company. She founded Chinese Culture Media Company and produced many TV programs for STAR Xing Kong, MTV, and BBC. She is leading the Retirement sector in Shenzhen Neptunus Group Co Ltd.

Juliet Lo
Founding Partner
